definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The advantages and applications of powder metallurgy materials in electrical appliances are briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了家用電器中的粉末冶金材料的特點和應用慨況。

sentences.english: Production of CNC Sample for home appliance, commodity, timekeeper and electronic product.
sentences.chinese: 家用電器，日用品，鐘錶電子產品手板製作。

sentences.english: Shanghai Liangmahe House Appliance Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 上海亮馬河家用電器有限公司。

sentences.english: A bride's parents often buy a whole set of white goods as a dowry.
sentences.chinese: 新娘的父母通常都買一整套的家用電器作爲嫁妝陪嫁。

sentences.english: The price of household appliances such as washing machines rises by a few pounds.
sentences.chinese: 像洗衣機這樣的家用電器價格將會上漲幾英鎊。

sentences.english: At least 5 years working experience in CB or household appliance sales.
sentences.chinese: 有5年以上家用電器或壁掛爐銷售經驗。

sentences.english: Electric cooker series products and other household appliances, one of the large enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 電燉鍋系列產品以及其它家用電器的大型企業之一。

sentences.english: Change electric equipment into energy-efficient ones and leave only one light on when you leave home.
sentences.chinese: 把家用電器換成節能型的，出門時最多留一盞燈開着。

sentences.english: One is standards for a variety of household appliances.
sentences.chinese: 其中之一是用於多種家用電器的標準。

sentences.english: You can find house appliances that can still be used in junkyards .
sentences.chinese: 在廢物堆積場你可以找到一些還能用的家用電器。

sentences.english: His wife lavished money upon household appliances.
sentences.chinese: 他妻子在家用電器上的濫花錢。
